channel.title: [pi] please help
channel.description: Only the host can connect to my server , which is me. I need help either re-doing my client, or making a webclient. Does anyone have any insight that could help me?

item.title: [pi] please help
item.dc:creator: @sagi_x-evolution sagi x-evolution
item.description:
@sagi_x-evolution wrote:

i think i know just what the problem ur facing is, in ur server n client files, where uve mentioned an ip address, uve either put 127.0.0.1(local host, only you can log in) which must be changed to you VPS ip if u have one, or ur ip if ur self-hosting, or hamachi ip. so what u need to do is make changes to this local host ip to ur present hosting service ip,
GL:) hope i was helpful

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] please help
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

Having other people connect to your server has nothing to do with “re-doing” your client or the web client, so address one issue at a time. There are plenty of guides out there that help you with getting your server “public”.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

There are more then just this one that I posted.

Read full topic
